MaxWalkSpeed.Description: in cm/s. The max walk speed in NM

CarryingCamperMaxWalkSpeedPercent.Description: in %. The max walk speed when carrying a survivor

FootstepLifetime.Description: in s. How long the footstep is visible for (fades in and out during this time)

FootstepMaximumVisibilityDistance.Description: in cm. How far before the outline is not visible anymore

FootStepFrequency.Description: in s. Footsteps are spawned every THIS amount of time

TipToeModeDuration.Description: in s. The max time that one can spend in TTM before being forced to NM

TipToeModeCooldown.Description: in s. After exiting TTM, the power goes on cooldown for this time before the Enter TTM interaction is made available once more

TipToeModeMaxWalkSpeed.Description: in cm/s. The max walk speed in TTM

TransitionToNormalModeDuration.Description: in s. The duration of the transition to NM

TransitionToTipToeModeDuration.Description: in s. The duration of the transition to TTM

TipToeModeDurationPenaltyPercentagePerM1.Description: in %. How much the TTM duration is depleted on M1 attempt

TipToeModeDurationWarningTimeUpAdvanceNo.Description: in s. How long before the HHM duration ends do we get a warning?

DistractionSpawnBuffer.Description: in cm. Buffer at which the max distance should receive. Currently the max spawn distance is the visibility distance

DistracionTargetDirectionRange.Description: in cm. Maximum target range at which the illusion actor should go to around the survivor

DistractionMaxVerticalSpawnRange.Description: in cm. Maximum height range where distractions can spawn from

DistractionLifetime.Description: in s. Lifetime of each distraction. -1 will make the lifetime last as long as tip toe mode

DistractionRandomSpawnRateMin.Description: #. Minimum range at which the random spawn rate should be

DistractionRandomSpawnRateMax.Description: #. Maximum range at which the random spawn rate should be

DistractionMaximumIdleTime.Description: in s. Maximum idle time for a distraction

MaximumDistractionAroundEachSurvivor.Description: #. Maximum distraction that each survivor can have around them. This only stop the spawning of a new distraction, if an existing one enter the range survivor can have more than this value

ChanceToRandomlyTurnBackOnPath.Description: in %. Chance to randomly turn back on path (Simulate mind game)

ChanceToRandomlyChangeDirection.Description: in %. Chance to randomly change direction (Simulate killer changing direction)

ChanceToRandomlyStop.Description: in %. Chance to randomly stop for max idle time (Simulate looking around or doing an action)

CameraWorkNormalModeSpringArmLength.Description: in cm. The length of the 3rd person camera spring arm when not colliding with anything

CameraWorkNormalModeSpringArmHeight.Description: in cm. The height of the 3rd person camera, from the floor

CameraWorkTTMModeSpringArmLength.Description: in cm. The length of the 3rd person camera spring arm when not colliding with anything

CameraWorkTTMModeSpringArmHeight.Description: in cm. The height of the 3rd person camera, from the floor

ScamperChargeupDuration.Description: in s. The duration of the scamper charge up interaction bar. At 100% full, Scamper becomes available

ScamperDuration.Description: in s. The duration of the scamper phase, before entering Slice and Dice

ScamperAccelerationMultiplier.Description: *. Acceleration multiplier for the scamper phase, setting this to -1 will disable any multiplier for this phase

SliceAndDiceAccelerationMultiplier.Description: *. Acceleration multiplier for the slice and dice portion of the attack, before hitting / obstructing / missing

SliceAndDiceOpenDuration.Description: in s. The duration of the slice and dice portion of the attack, before hitting / obstructing / missing

SliceAndDiceSucceedDuration.Description: in s. The duration of the slice and dice portion after the attack when succeed hit

SliceAndDiceMissDuration.Description: in s. The duration of the slice and dice portion after the attack when missing

SliceAndDiceObstructDuration.Description: in s. The duration of the slice and dice portion after the attack when obstructing

SliceAndDiceTurnRateLimit.Description: in degrees. The limit applied to player's left/right turn rate once started the slice and dice attack. Setting this to -1 will disable any limit

SliceAndDiceAttackZoneScaleFactor.Description: *. Scaling of the attack zone of slice and dice

ScamperChainingInputBuffer.Description: in s. Small buffer to let the user press the chain before the prompt appears. If no buffer is allowed set this to 0.1. Only valid if chaining requires an input

CrawlDuration.Description: in s. The duration of the scamper under a pallet

QuickVaultDuration.Description: in s. The duration of the scamper on a window

InjureAfterQuickVaultBuffer.Description: in s. Buffer after a quick in which an injure should trigger the scoring event
